job_description:
Company: NextGenSystems
Position: Technical Project Manager
Location: Dallas, TX (Hybrid)
Salary: $130,000 - $160,000

About Us:
NextGenSystems delivers innovative technology solutions to help businesses thrive in the digital age. We are committed to excellence and customer satisfaction.

Job Description:
We are looking for a Technical Project Manager to lead cross-functional teams and deliver complex software projects on time and within budget. You will be responsible for planning, executing, and monitoring project progress.

Responsibilities:
- Define project scope, goals, and deliverables
- Develop project plans and timelines
- Manage project budgets and resources
- Track project progress and report on status
- Identify and mitigate project risks

Requirements:
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
- 5+ years of experience in project management
- Strong understanding of software development methodologies
- Excellent communication and interpersonal skills

Preferred Qualifications:
- PMP certification
- Agile experience

Benefits:
- Competitive salary and benefits package
- Opportunity to work on challenging and rewarding projects
- Collaborative and supportive work environment
